subject: Monitoring of Project Directors working with CM division and review of progress of O & M activities.
text: HTf <clq TTHI xifearrot TH4 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (Ma 9e7, &ed 4tTa7 3< Tvunf T7T4) Y4H /Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India GH Extn _ 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) 011-5 & 6, #2r-10, ERGT, 7 fdcrit-110 075 No: 110412,81288 2A8,Drarka; = New Delhi-110075 14lh January 2008 POLICY MATTERS: TECHNICAL 04 /2008) (Decision taken on note of CM Division dated 11.12.2007) Sub: Monitoring of Project Directors working with CM Division and review of progress of 0 & M activities It has been decided to review monthly performance of Project Directors, dealing with 0 & M works and tolling under Corridor Management Division, at Head Quarters level and quarterly or earlier (as per preference) the review of monthly performance of all PDs will be submitted to Chairman: The various performance indicators with respect  to 0 & M works tolling to monitor  performance of PDs is enclosed as Annex and Annex IL: AII PDs dealing with 0 & M works and tolling are requested to submit monthly report by 5th of every month as per performance indicators enclosed. Report  for 0 & M work   should be addressed and sent to GM (CM) and for toll operations to GM (CO) (V: K Sharma) General Manager (Admn) To PS to Chairman All MembersICVO/CGMs All GMsIDGMs_ Managers (Admn)Hindi Officerl Librarian All PIUs/CMUs NHAL key
